name: Momentus
description: I am digital activist and multimedia artist. I stand for recycling not only material things but also digital. For one day person can do a big digital trace and amount of emissions.I recile my artworks, music, design, etc... this works is fully recycled from music to graphics and video footeges Video made with use of old remade footages, 3d modeling and photogrammetry object in one piece of art.
